content: उपायः {@--1@} ({%a%}) Means, an expedient, remedy; उपायं चिंतयेत्प्राज्ञस्तथापायं च चिंतयेत् <ls>Pt. 1. 406</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 21</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 48</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">7. 177.</ls> ({%b%}) A plan, contrivance; °निलया <ls>Mu. 1. 5.</ls> ({%c%}) A mode, way, stratagem. {@--2@} A fact, circumstance; <ls>U. 7.</ls> {@--3@} Beginning, commencement. {@--4@} Effort, exertion; <ls>Bg. 6. 36</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 248</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">10. 2.</ls> {@--5@} A means of success against an enemy; (these are four:-- सामन् conciliation or negotiation, दानं bribery; भदः sowing dissensions; and दंडः punishment, open attack; some authorities add three more:-- माया deceit; उपेक्षा trick, deceit or neglect; इंद्रजाल conjuring; thus making the total number {7}); चतुर्थोपायसाध्ये तु रिपौ सांत्त्रमपक्रिया <ls>Śi. 2. 54</ls>; सामादीनामुपायानां चतुर्णामपि पंडिताः <ls>Ms. 7. 109.</ls> {@--6@} Joining (as in singing). {@--7@} Approach.
